entry.title: U.S. Warns of Stepped-Up Russian Strikes in Ukraine
entry.content: The U.S. urged Americans to leave as soon as possible ahead of a potential escalation in Russian attacks on civilian areas in Ukraine to coincide with the war-torn countryâ€™s Independence Day on Wednesday.

entry.title: After Six Months of War in Ukraine, Momentum Tilts Against Russia
entry.content: Moscow retains a firepower advantage, but Kyiv is starting to take the initiative, while Western support for Ukraine is holding firm despite economic pain.
